Package eus.klimu.notification.api

Class LocalizedNotificationController

java.lang.Object
eus.klimu.notification.api.LocalizedNotificationController
@Controller
@RequestMapping("/localized-notification")
public class LocalizedNotificationController
extends java.lang.Object
Create, update, delete and get information for the Localized Notifications. They represent the different notifications of a specific type on a specific location. Takes care of all the CRUD methods, working with the database through an internal Service.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private LocalizedNotificationService localizedNotificationService
    A class that allows modifying the localized notifications.
    private LocationService locationService
    A class that allows modifying the locations.
    private NotificationTypeService notificationTypeService
    A class that allows modifying the notification types.

  • Method Details

    • getLocalizedNotification

      @GetMapping(value="{id}", produces={"application/json","application/xml"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<LocalizedNotification> getLocalizedNotification​(@PathVariable long id)

      Get a localized notification based on it's ID.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/localized-notification/{id}

      • Consumes: text/plain
      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the localized notification the function is going to look for.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok with the localized notification as a JSON if found or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • getLocalizedNotification

      @GetMapping(consumes={"application/json","application/xml"}, produces={"application/json","application/xml"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<LocalizedNotification> getLocalizedNotification​(@RequestBody LocationDTO location, @RequestBody NotificationTypeDTO notificationType)

      Get a localized notification based on it's location and it's notification type.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/localized-notification

      • Consumes: application/json, application/xml
      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      location - A Data Transfer Object of a location.
      notificationType - A Data Transfer Object of a notification type.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok with the localized notification as a JSON if found or a 4000 bad request if it wasn't.

    • getLocalizedNotifications

      @GetMapping(value="/all", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<LocalizedNotification>> getLocalizedNotifications()

      Get all the localized notifications from the database.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/localized-notification/all

      • Produces: application/json
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok with the channel as a JSON if found or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • getLocalizedNotifications

      @GetMapping(value="/all/location", produces="application/json", consumes="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<LocalizedNotification>> getLocalizedNotifications​(@RequestBody LocationDTO location)

      Get all the localized notifications by location from the database.

      • Consumes: application/json, application/xml
      • Produces: application/json
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/localized-notification/all/location

      Parameters:
      location - A Data Transfer Object of a location.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok with the channel as a JSON if found or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • getLocalizedNotifications

      @GetMapping(value="/all/type", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<LocalizedNotification>> getLocalizedNotifications​(@RequestBody NotificationTypeDTO notificationType)

      Get all the localized notifications by location from the database.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/localized-notification/all/type

      • Consumes: application/json, application/xml
      • Produces: application/json
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      notificationType - A Data Transfer Object of a notification type.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok with the channel as a JSON if found or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • createLocalizedNotification

      @PostMapping(value="/create", consumes={"application/json","application/xml"}, produces={"application/json","application/xml"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<LocalizedNotification> createLocalizedNotification​(@RequestBody LocalizedNotificationDTO localizedNotification)

      Save a new localized notification on the database, once it's added, an ID will be added to that localized notification.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/localized-notification/create

      • Consumes: application/json, application/xml
      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      localizedNotification - A Data Transfer Object of the localized notification.
      Returns:
      A 201 created with the channel as a JSON if found or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • createLocalizedNotifications

      @PostMapping(value="/create/all", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<LocalizedNotification>> createLocalizedNotifications​(@RequestBody java.util.List<LocalizedNotificationDTO> localizedNotifications)

      Save an X amount of new localized notification to the database, once they are added, an ID will be added to those localized notifications.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/localized-notification/create/all

      • Consumes: application/json
      • Produces: application/json
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      localizedNotifications - A list of Data Transfer Objects for the localized notifications that are going to be created.
      Returns:
      A 201 created with the localized notifications as a JSON if created or a 400 bad request if they weren't.

    • updateLocalizedNotification

      @PutMapping(value="/update", consumes={"application/json","application/xml"}, produces={"application/json","application/xml"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<LocalizedNotification> updateLocalizedNotification​(@RequestBody LocalizedNotificationDTO localizedNotification)

      Modify an existing channel on the database.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/localized-notification/update

      • Consumes: application/json, application/xml
      • Produces: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      localizedNotification - A Data Transfer Object for the localized notification that is going to be updated.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok with the localized notification as a JSON if updated or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • deleteLocalizedNotification

      @DeleteMapping(value="/delete/{id}", produces={"application/json","application/xml"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> deleteLocalizedNotification​(@PathVariable long id)

      Delete a channel from the database based on it's ID.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/channel/delete/{id}

      • Consumes: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      id - A Localized Notification Data Transfer Object for the localized notification that is going to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok with the localized notification was deleted or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.

    • deleteLocalizedNotification

      @DeleteMapping(value="/delete", consumes={"application/json","application/xml"}, produces={"application/json","application/xml"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> deleteLocalizedNotification​(@RequestBody LocalizedNotificationDTO localizedNotification)

      Delete a channel from the database.

      https://klimu.eus/RestAPI/localized-notification/delete

      • Consumes: application/json, application/xml
      • Requires: Access and Refresh tokens as headers.
      Parameters:
      localizedNotification - A Channel Data Transfer Object for the localized notification that is going to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A 200 ok with the localized notification was deleted or a 400 bad request if it wasn't.
